channel.title: DivineScape - The new Divine
channel.description:
The new Divine - Created by Darknitepk10
The Mission: DivineScape alot of new experiences, new monsters, new storylines, new quests, and an overall sucessful gameplay. Consisting of the majority of working skills, DivineScape will unveil itself as a clean slate welcoming members of all kinds.
The Innovation: DivineScape will cater to all the needs of its players, providing working, challenging skills for dedicated gameplayers. Whilest focusing on minigames, quests, and combat to provide different aspects of gameplay for its diverse members.
Support DivineScape: [img]http://fiastechnology.110mb.com/support/image.php?id=DivineScape[/img] Click [url=http://fiastechnology.110mb.com/support/support.php?id=DivineScape]http://fiastechnology.110mb.com/support/support.php?id=DivineScape[/url] to support DivineScape. Team:
Server: Dark Nite10
Site: Ryan
[code] Update log:
11/14/09: Amulet of glory.
11/12/09: Done Varrock 100% - Shops,Npc,Dungeons, etc. Blitz Delay. Magic System Done. Al-Kharid 90% Done. Sailor Added(4 Types of teleports).[/code]
Pictures: Blitz Delay + Godsword hit. [img]http://i34.tinypic.com/300b989.jpg[/img] Magic System. [img]http://i38.tinypic.com/2wgviqf.jpg[/img] Amulet of glory: [img]http://i36.tinypic.com/24lt1dz.jpg[/img]

[/quote]

you officially ruined this topic with the posting and saying the server is ruined

it’s OTHER peoples servers NOT YOURS so FUCK OFF if you dont have ANYTHING GOOD to say[/quote]

Godswords don’t belong with a 420 gameframe.

And you hurt my feelings
